title: What is the most beautiful line in a song that you recently heard? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer, my friend, is blowing in the wind. - Bob Dylan Why i loved it? 1 powerful words My friend is very effective in literature. Listening to it instantly covers in the warmth of friendship, a feeling of familiarity, a taste of relief. It develops a level of understanding, which is supported by a sense of being accepted. Living with confusions and questions is obvious to everyone’s life, therefore, search of appropriate answer is everyone’s desire. The answer, in this line, addresses that desire. Seeing something blowing in the wind is fascinating. This line lured me with such fascination. 2 very abstract . What sorts of answers? Everything?? What does it mean by blowing in the wind? Since I don’t see wind, but feel it, does it mean that answers are never concrete, something like wind?? I found this line to be more abstract than anything my ears have ever encountered 3 melody and voice To describe the melody and voice of Bob Dylan is something I can’t dare to do. Daring so would unveil my insufficiency.

It's quite difficult to choose from a song so I present you the the most beautiful lines.. “Ocean blue eyes, looking in mine... I feel like I might sink and drown and die...” ~ (Gorgeous by TS)This description of someone's eyes makes me regret that I'm single.. -_- “There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have” - (Gorgeous by TS)“You've ruined my life by not being mine..” (◑▂◑ one of the bestttt lines I've ever heard)“Been waiting for a lifetime for you” ~ (For you - freed)“I'm a stormy ocean, but you're steady and I'm a commotion but you get me...” ~ (Collide by Rachel Platten)This one is for all those people who back -stabbed me in 2017.. “So I cut you off... I don't need your love. ‘Cause I already cried enough..” ~ (IDGAF by Dua Lipa)“You gotta leave before you get left” ~ (I Did something bad by TS)And this one's my favourite : “Reindeers are better than people” ~ (Frozen )P. S. : I know the last one's not recent but I heard it recently so it's recent for me.. >3< Thanks for stopping by.. :)
